item.title: vCenter Configuration Manager Split Install Issues
item.description: vCM or vCenter Configuration Manager 5.5 was released in March by VMware with a few new features. First of all and the topic of this blog post, is the re-inclusion of a split install. Split install being the database, application and web page can be on different servers.You ask didn’t vCM or SCM or ECM (depending on when you used vCM last) have this feature before? It did back in the 5.
